pages.text: Bells are one of the most important parts of a railroad/railway crossing. They warn you early that the gate is active, a train is coming, and you should stop immediately. Thingamajigs adds some mechanical and electronic bells for you to use.

All railroad crossing components follow the vertical redstone system, and must be placed at the top of crossings, not between or below other parts. They do not receive a redstone signal, and act as a semi-source for redstone components. In a Thingamajigs 2 addon, the bells are improved with performance and there are more of them.
